tool.name: Minfi Get CN
tool.description: get the coordinating node associated with this D1Client object

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE) MSet <- get(load('$mset'))
CN <- getCN(MSet)
write.table(CN, '$matrix')

param.name: mset
param.label: MethylSet
param.help: This class holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Minfi Get CN retrive the detailed copy number (CN) variation associated with methylation activity for each probed CpG site.
**Input information**
Input data is MethylSet class R object holding preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.
**Output information**
Minfi Get CN output copy number of the values defined as the sum of the methylation and unmethylation channel for each probed CpG site. ============ ============================ ============================ GSM1588704_8795207135_R01C02 GSM1588705_8795207119_R05C02 ------------ ---------------------------- ---------------------------- "cg00050873" 13.8823564686542 14.1270270430046 "cg00212031" 10.4356702609366 10.0579917227592 "cg00213748" 9.467605550083 8.7279204545632 "cg00214611" 10.3987436919382 10.3454052467178 =======================================================================
